short_summary: CONSTRUCTION SERVICES FOR FOUNDATION AND SLAB OF FOUNDATION 12740 TRITES ROAD RICHMOND BC
description: CONSTRUCTION SERVICES FOR FOUNDATION AND SLAB OF FROTMENTAL STDYABUS IN DOFEI DIAMAND PROJECT.
full_summary:
### Tender Information
#### F1571-230203 Paramount Building 25 - Foundation and Slab on Grade Construction

### Procurement Reference Information
* Reference Number: WS4098019308-Doc4099419732
* Solicitation Number: WS4098019308
* Amendment Number: 1

### Notice and Timeline
* Publication Date: 2023-07-14
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-08-03T14:00:00
* Last Amendment Date: 2023-07-27

### Description of Requirement
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is inviting firms to bid on the construction of a concrete foundation and concrete slab on grade for a new ~15,700 sqft prefabricated steel building in Steveston Paramount.

The project involves the preparation of the site including sub base preparation, anchor bolt placement, and provision of all required concrete testing and quality control for concrete and anchor bolt placement. The construction work includes:

* Sub base preparation
* Reinforced concrete pad, footings, and grade beam construction
* Reinforced concrete slab on grade construction
* Anchor bolt placement

### Tendering Information
* Tender Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Tender Category: CNST
* Notice Type: Invitation to Qualify
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements and Regions
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to qualified contractors registered under CFTA.

### Contracting and Contact Information
* Contractor: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Person: Kelly (Bryan), PSPC/SPAC
* Contact Email: [kelly.bryan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kelly.bryan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Website URL for Tender Notice: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16877279?extsite=MTY4NzcyNzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16877279?extsite=MTY4NzcyNzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Additional Information
The construction work will be carried out on Federal Crown land in Steveston, British Columbia. All bidders
